CustomField.description: Calculates the full 12 month term ACV for the Opportunity Product Line. Annualizes Term less than 12 months or greater than 12 months
CustomField.formula: IF(Subscription_Type_Text__c <> "Renewable",0, IF( AND(Subscription_Type_Text__c ="Renewable",SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__EffectiveStartDate__c > Opportunity_Start_Date__c + 364),0, TotalPrice / Opp_Prod_Line_Term__c * 12 ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the full 12 month term ACV for the Opportunity Product Line. Annualizes Term less than 12 months or greater than 12 months
CustomField.label: Opp Prod Line ACV Full Term
